attributes.action: bring light to the Shia massacre happening Right Now in Hangu, Pakistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Shia Muslims in N.W.F.P (Hangu District) have not been allowed to hold the Muharam procession (which is a part of their annual worship).
Furthermore they are being beheaded on the roads , their arms and legs amputated.There is curfew in the city but the massacre , has not stopped.We request you to do everything within your power to put an end to these barbaric acts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
